name: WKSwipeGestureRecognizerDirection
desc: Constants indicating the direction of a swipe.

items.name: static var right: WKSwipeGestureRecognizerDirection
items.desc: The touch moves from left to right. This direction is the default.

items.name: static var left: WKSwipeGestureRecognizerDirection
items.desc: The touch moves from right to left.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Returns a new direction constant based on the provided raw value.
